backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining health check, user profiles with access control, and extensive resident-related types and records.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old and new data structures and logic scaffolding for transforming resident-related records across schema versions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized frontend file purposes describing routing, layouts, modals, hooks, styles, and resident-profile–related components.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v22-to-pro: Documentation describing the release-only promotion of Draft Version 22 to production with checklists and verification steps.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v27-to-pro: Documentation for promoting Draft Version 27 to production, outlining process, verification, and rollback steps.
frontend/index.css: Initializes Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app and sets favicon and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures React Query, theme provider, routing structure, and bootstraps the overall app shell.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s ADL records in a table with an option to add new records.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for creating a new ADL record with date, activity, assistance level, and notes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootErrorSc: Displays detailed boot‑time error diagnostics with retry and logout options.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for new users to set their name, role, and optional related resident IDs.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Renders the Moritz Care Home logo in different size variants.
Layout shell managing authentication, navigation, header/footer, and rendering nested routes.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s MAR records with medication names and provides a modal for adding new records.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal form for creating a MAR record, validating inputs, and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/medications/admi: Defines allowed administration routes and helper to include non-standard route values.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Renders active and discontinued medications with details and optional edit/discontinue actions.
Lists a resident’s medications, supports adding, editing, and discontinuing when permitted.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal for adding a medication with fields for dosage, route, times, physician, notes, and PRN option.
Modal component allowing users to edit medication details, manage administration times, and submit updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/resident-profile: Displays a resident's insurance records in a table with options to add or edit entries.
Shows the resident's pharmacy information and provides navigation to add or edit pharmacy entries.
Lists assigned physicians with specialty and contact info, including edit and add actions.
Renders a table of responsible contacts with relationship and contact details, supporting add and edit actions.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Badge component that visually displays a resident's code status as DNR or Full Code.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Form modal for creating a new resident, managing complex state for personal info, contacts, physicians, medications, and submitting via useAddResident.
Modal allowing editing of an existing resident’s core information and pharmacy data, submitting updates through useUpdateResident.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a printable resident profile report including personal info, physicians, medications, and other key details.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a resident’s daily vitals in a table and provides a button to open the record-vitals modal when write access is allowed.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Input modal for recording daily vital signs, validating required fields and submitting values using useAddDailyVitals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, and permissions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes and caches a resilient backend actor with retry logic and identity handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color themes, solid dialog overrides, dark mode rules, and print styling.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Implements simple authorization helpers for checking staff/admin access and resident visibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/resident-profile/insu: Provides a form to create and submit new insurance information for a resident. On save, it sends the data to the backend and navigates back to the resident profile.
Loads an existing insurance entry for a resident, populates a form for editing, and submits updates. Navigates back to the resident profile after saving.
frontend/src/pages/resident-profile/phar: Contains a form to add a new pharmacy record for a resident and submits the data through a mutation. Redirects back to the resident profile after saving.
Fetches a specific pharmacy entry, pre-fills an edit form, and updates the pharmacy info on submit. Returns to the resident profile after saving changes.
frontend/src/pages/resident-profile/phys: Provides a form for adding a physician to a resident's profile and submits the new physician data. Redirects to the resident profile after completion.
Displays a form to edit a resident's physician, preloads existing data, and submits updates via a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/resident-profile/resp: Provides a form to add a new responsible contact for a resident and submits it through an add-contact mutation.
Loads an existing responsible contact, populates a form for editing, and updates the contact on submit.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Displays resident dashboard with stats, filters, search, and a UI to add new residents.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Shows detailed resident profile with editing, clinical records, permissions checks, and modal workflows.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays and saves user settings, currently allowing toggling of the resident profile report visibility. Loads the user profile, tracks changes, and submits updates via a save action.
frontend/src/utils/dateOnly.ts: Implements timezone-safe date parsing and age calculation utilities, plus simple age formatting.
frontend/src/utils/errorDiagnostics.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into structured diagnostics and provides formatting for readable error output.
frontend/src/utils/residentSorting.ts: Defines helpers to sort residents by room number with optional name or status secondary sorting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current feature set and architectural notes, focusing on expanding resident profiles with new multi-entry sidebar sections and dedicated add/edit screens.
